content.webTitle: Multi-coloured swap shop opens its doors

fields.headline: Multi-coloured swap shop opens its doors
fields.bodyText: For the ultimate in stylish thrift, London's fashionistas needed to look no further than the 'Visa Swap Loft', held yesterday in Covent Garden. Fronted by American actress Lindsay Lohan, the Visa Swap campaign, now in its second year, allows people to exchange their unwanted clothes for other people's cast-offs. Participants dropped off unwanted items at collection points over the last six weeks, receiving points on a swipe card. The more exclusive the outfit, the more points they received, which they could spend yesterday on other donated items.
